member.name: D2D_RECT_U
member.summary: Represents a rectangle defined by the upper-left corner pair of coordinates (left,top) and the lower-right corner pair of coordinates (right, bottom). These coordinates are expressed as a 32-bit integer values.

member.name: D2D_RECT_U.left
member.summary: The x-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the rectangle.

member.name: D2D_RECT_U.top
member.summary: The y-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the rectangle.

member.name: D2D_RECT_U.right
member.summary: The x-coordinate of the lower-right corner of the rectangle.

member.name: D2D_RECT_U.bottom
member.summary: The y-coordinate of the lower-right corner of the rectangle.
